name: Stunning 5BR w/Parking, Seaport, Boston, BCEC, WTC
summary: Outstanding Single Family brick home WITH PRIVATE PARKING (one large vehicle) Conveniently located minutes from everywhere you want to be...downtown Boston, the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center (BCEC), Seaport District, even the beach is within a 5 minute walk.
space: Located just several minutes from downtown Boston, in the heart of Boston's "Southie" neighborhood, this home offers you everything that you need. This 5 Bedroom, 3 1/2 bathroom brick home comes fully furnished...nothing was left out. Meticulous craftsmanship with no expense spared creates a seamless blend of urban chic and Victorian charm. This sun filled well appointed home has been restored to highlight the grandeur of stained glass windows, original moldings, and woodwork. Open floor plan designed for today's living with pocket doors separating living and dining area. Cook gourmet meals in your dream chef's kitchen designed for family & friend gatherings. Fireplaces & high ceilings w/ intricate medallions highlight the book cased living & adjoining dining room. Oversized gorgeous brand new baths w/ the best of everything - too numerous to list.  The bedrooms all include Tempurpedic mattresses, high thread count linens, plenty of comfortable pillows, and plenty of storage. The maste

neighborhood_overview: This home is all about the location! No matter what it is you want to do in Boston, this location will be ideal. The bus stop is within a minute walking from the house. Or even easier is to just take an Uber. We are within a 4 minute Uber ride to the BCEC, downtown Boston 5-6 minutes, Seaport within 3 minutes, and the beach is within a 5 minute walk. Essentials you may need are all within several minutes walking distance.... Dunkin Donuts, Starbucks, pharmacy, grocery stores, restaurants, bars, etc.
notes: PARKING! We have private parking available. One large vehicle (upto Cadillac Escalade size for example)
transit: Using the bus, the train (The T), or Uber/Lyfts are very easy from the location of my home. The bus stop is within a minute from the house on East Broadway. The bus can get you anywhere you want to go. If you wish to get to The T, take the #7 bus. But the best way to get around will be to take an Uber/Lyft. Everything is only a few minutes via Uber/Lyft.
access: Enjoy the entire home! You and your guests have access to everything.
interaction: I am available by text or by message via the Air BnB website. All messages are returned within minutes. Other than that, I will not disturb you and your guests so that you may enjoy your stay.

summary: This apartment is in a luxury apartment building and comes with many amenities which you would have access to as a guest including the high-end fitness center, sun deck with outdoor pool, business center,  and resident lounge. Just steps to some of the top restaurants & lounges in the city, The ICA, Boston's World Trade Center, Boston's Convention & Exhibition Centers. Less than 10min walk from MBTAs South Station, NE Aquarium and minutes drive to historic Fenway Park.

neighborhood_overview: About Seaport:   Boston's Seaport neighborhood has always been a scenic enclave near downtown; now it's rapidly becoming the place to live, shop, dine out, and entertain. A stunning renewal is nearing completion that will transform this harbor-side district into one of the prime destinations for the region. Shopping for days. Dining that will leave you savoring even that final morsel. Entertainment to satisfy the vibrant, diverse community that is becoming the new Seaport. Super close to ICA (Institute of Contemporary Arts), Convention Center, Lawn on D, Moakley Courthouse and Boston Childrens Museum
notes: Please be sure to request any additonal items you may need during your stay and we will try to accomodate according to you needs. This area has a resurgence of high tech companies adding to the energy and vibe.
transit: 10 minute walk to Downtown. Close to Fanuel Hall and Aquarium as well. The train is very accessible and uber is also another option for a cheap ride to Back Bay or North End NEARBY TRANSPORTATION Subway Silver Line – Courthouse Station Red Line – South Station Commuter Rail – South Station Buses 4 – Courthouse Station  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) – World Trade Centre Station  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) – South Station Ferries F1 – Rowes Wharf Ferry Terminal F4, F2H – Long Wharf Ferry Terminal
access: Guest will have access to all community amenities such as:  24-hour fitness center 2nd and 3rd floor conference rooms  Sun deck Yoga and Spin studio Business center Rooftop resort-style pool Cyber lounge Complimentary electric car charging station Pet wash station Smoke-free living Bicycle storage 24-hour package pickup Guests will have full access to the apartment including the kitchen, living/bedroom, and bathroom. The room is stocked with essential toiletries and any necessary towels and linens. Iron, ironing board, and hair dryer are also available for use. We stocked the kitchen with the essentials, if you're a big cook (like me!) please verify we have what you need and I can bring what we don't already have.
interaction: I am available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout and I can confirm in 24 hours. 2. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 3. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. It may be possible to obtain permission to host a party; contact me to learn more. 4. If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required. 5. Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events. 6. If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in ful
host_about: Im a Boston native and happy to help you see the great parts of Boston that arent in the Guidebooks. I look forward to connecting with people traveling to Boston and aim to make each guest experience this beautiful place like a local. Thanks for checking out my place and I hope to talk to you soon!

name: Private Suite in South Boston | Convenient to BCEC
summary: This private suite is located in South Boston surrounded by lots of restaurants, bars and transportation.  You will enjoy the privacy of your space in my home.  The guest bedroom, living room and private bathroom are located downstairs.   You can walk to all the nightlife in South Boston, Seaport, or South End.
space: The guest suite is located downstairs, whereas the kitchen, main living room, my bedroom, and access to the outdoor patio and backyard is upstairs.  You will enjoy lots of privacy in your space.

You are also within walking distance or a short Uber ride to the Seaport or South End.  There is a Foodie's grocery store and a coffee shop conveniently just around the corner.

It is about a 15-20 minute walk to the World Trade Center Silver line stop. Uber or Lyft to the Back Bay, Fenway, or North End is typically less than $15.  Neighborhood street parking is also available.

host_about: I've lived in many regions of the country and traveled to six continents.  Boston has been home to me for 5+ years.  Besides traveling, I enjoy being outdoors hiking, running, yoga, biking, and laying on a beach.  I have a 10 year old Boston Terrier that is my trusty sidekick.

name: Elegant 1-BR in Boston near The Childrens Museum!
summary: This property is located on the Waterfront in Fort Point, a gorgeous neighborhood full of history, galleries and artists' lofts. The residence is just a short walk along the Harborwalk away from Boston's Financial District, making for an easy commute to work or other areas of the great city. Also, find over the top finishes and amenities in this brand new high-rise.
space: Located on the Boston Harbor, this stylish apartment offers nothing but the best amenities to best suit your busy lifestyle and guarantee a comfortable stay. The beautiful high-rise includes a 24-hour attended lobby, a rooftop sky lounge and BBQ area, state-of-the-art fitness center with spectacular views, an entertainment lounge, business center with community workspaces, a community kitchen, a dog park, bike storage, valet dry cleaning, and short walks to transit and museums. Known as a world famous city, Boston has much to offer with its cultural aspects, fine dining options like, The Barking Crab and Papagayo, and sites worth seeing such as the Boston Harbor, Fenway Park, and Faneuil Hall Marketplace. Make sure to enjoy your stay at one of the most luxurious residences in the area.

Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: Minion 3? Convention/Subway/Beach 130C
summary: An Entire 2 bedroom, 600sqft, apartment w/ 4 total beds (1 Queen, 2 Twin, 1 Sofa). Luxury beds/shower/sheets. 5 min drive to Downtown and Airport, 5 min walk to the Beach/Ocean, and 12 min walk to the Redline Subway station. In the South Boston neighborhood. The location is great because you've got the City, Nature, Beach, and Transportation. 3rd floor - no elevator. Approx $10 Uber ride to Boston Convention Center (BCEC). Great for a getaway too! No dedicated parking. Find our Minion friend?
space: ACTUAL GUEST REVIEW JULY 2018: “These guys are well prepared. Very smooth, access with codes, the place was impeccable, and the SHOWER head... OOOOOOHH that shower head... AWESOME! Also, the mattresses are VERY VERY COMFORTABLE ... even the bunker ones; you'll get a good rest, promised ... ”  An entire 2 bedroom (2nd bedroom is smaller), 1 bathroom apartment to your very own. Third floor (3rd) unit, no elevator. The living room contains a couch that pulls out into a Full size bed. The large bedroom contains a Queen bed. The smaller bedroom contains a bunk bed (Twin bed over a Twin bed) that can each hold an adult up to 250 pounds. Please note that there is no door on the 2nd bedroom, and thus it's open to the living room. Beds: 1 queen bed in the bedroom, and 2 twin bunk beds, and the sofa turns into a full bed. The space can fit 6 comfortably (2 on each queen bed and sofa bed) and then 1 person each twin/twin. Also remember that there is only 1 bathroom for all to use.  There is a FUL

neighborhood_overview: NEIGHBORHOOD: It's walking distance (10 mins) from 3 red-line subways (Andrews Square, Broadway, JFK) that will take you to downtown Boston and Cambridge, and you're also walking distance to Carson Beach (10 mins) where there is beach volleyball in the summer. There are a couple of great restaurants nearby, including one down the street from Telegraph Hill (called Telegraph Hill), and closer to the center of South Boston, there are a number of well regarded fine dining restaurants and bars – just 5-8 blocks away. Approx $10 Uber ride to the Boston Convention Center (BCEC), or approx 30 minute walk. DISTANCE TO POPULAR DESTINATIONS: 1. The Boston airport is 5.0 miles away and that's a 10 minute drive in normal traffic. You can also take the subway (blue or silver line, then to red line). 2. The BCEC (Boston Convention & Exhibition Center) is 1.4 miles away or a 32 minute walk or 5 minute drive.  3. The closest subway ("T") stop is at Andrew Square (red line) 0.3 miles away or 8 minute w
notes: TO HELP US ENSURE YOU HAVE A QUIET, PEACEFUL, AND ENJOYABLE TIME WHILE STAYING WITH US, WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO KNOW THE FOLLOWING APPLIES FOR ALL GUESTS WE HOST: 1. We ask you to remove your shoes while inside the units. Boston homes are full of charm, but are also some of the oldest in the country and thus the walls and floors are thin – and sound travels. Removing your shoes helps to both protect our floors, but also ensures the people below you also quietly enjoy their stay. 2. No loud noises before 9am and after 10pm. As noted above, sound travels. Our unit has a device by Netatmo, called the Home Health Coach, and it measures air quality/pollution, humidity, temperature, and noise levels – and amongst other things, alerts us when noise levels get too high. Sounds are NOT recorded though. 3. For your safety, we also have a Leeo which monitors for the smoke alarm and carbon monoxide alarms and notifies us if they sound off, so as to keep you safe. We get notified if an alarm goes off
transit: It's walking distance (10 mins) from 2 red-line subways that will take you to downtown Boston and Cambridge. There is also a bus stop right out front. See the HOUSE MANUAL for parking tips. There is also Uber that can pickup/dropoff for inexpensive to downtown Boston. Approx $10 Uber ride to the Boston Convention Center (BCEC), or approx 30 minute walk.
access: The entire unit (kitchen, bathroom, living room, bedrooms), and common laundry. Parking is often available on the street during the daytime and weekends, but much more difficult at night and during snow emergencies. Keyless entry system. As your arrival date nears, 1 day prior, you will be sent a message with instructions for electronic keycode access. Check in time is 3pm, and check out time is 11am - that gives us a 4 hour window to have my cleaning crew fully clean, disinfect, change sheets, for your arrival and the guest coming in after you. You can check in anytime thereafter. Please note that this also means that the 11am check out must be strictly adhered to on your last day, as we may have another guest checking in that afternoon, and need time for my cleaning people to do the same. Unlike a hotel that has multiple rooms to shuffle around, that is not the case here.
interaction: This is a fully contained private apartment so there is no need for direct interaction with guests, though we do like to meet you and you will see us around the building doing maintenance, etc.. You may call/text/email through here anytime as well. Before you arrive and after you leave, my cleaning crew will come in to clean and disinfect everything, replace all the sheets with newly clean ones. Please remember that check in time is 3pm and check out is 11am - this is important because I often have guests check in/out on the same days, back-to-back.
house_rules: - Quiet hours before 9AM and after 10PM - Please remove shoes while inside the apartment - Please be considerate of our neighbors
host_about: I grew up in Colorado, moved to Cambridge to attend MIT, moved away to London and various places, now back in Boston for the past 20 years. My husband, Sean is a retired US Army veteran and graduate of the US Military Academy (West Point) - and we love to host. We also like to travel and we host as we would want to be hosted when we travel - we like comfort and convenience. Come visit, play some volleyball at the nearby beach - or just head downtown - we can walk there too!

neighborhood_overview: Apartment is on a quiet and safe street and only blocks away from the nightlife. Churches, library, restaurants, gyms, bars, shops, beaches, Castle Island, grocery stores, and bus stops are all easily accessible by foot.
notes: Parking in South Boston are primarily resident only after 6pm on week nights. During the day and all day on weekends, spots are free for all. However, parking spots are generally hard to find after 5pm. So for most sights and activities, guests may find other means of transportations (Uber/Walk/Bus) more convenient and less stress inducing.
transit: Uber, Lyft, buses to downtown and subway (Red Line Broadway Station), Hubway (rental bikes), and walking.

host_about: I’m a firm believer of traveling a thousand miles are worth more than reading a thousand books, although I like to do both. I want to see the world and experience the differences in cultures, interact with new people, and partake in the local cuisines. It’s not just for fun, as I believe these valuable experiences are also lessons that allow me to understand myself and shape my world view.

Also walking distance to Convention Center (9 minute walk) and Seaport neighborhood. Beach and Castle Island also minutes away by bike or car!
notes: Are you in town for a conference or convention?? Then this is the place for you! Minutes away by foot... easy access to all that the convention center and Seaport neighborhood has to offer! SECURITY - Please Note: For the security of guests and other residents of the building there is a camera located at the entrance of the building (not inside the condo). This will be monitored by the host should there be any issues during your stay.

Walking distance to all of South Boston, the South End (tons more great food & shopping), the thriving Seaport / waterfront neighborhood, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center! 5 blocks from MBTA "T" Red Line (Broadway stop) which is 1 stop from South Station, 2 stops from Downtown Crossing and also accessible to Logan Airport.   MBTA "T" bus stop 200' away - #9 line, accessible to Copley Center / Downtown. Hubway bike sharing station (great way to tour the city in warmer months!) 2 blocks away. Zip car (short term vehicle rentals) 1 block away. Enterprise car rental location also a short walk away. If you do have a car please note: Parking is available ON-STREET ONLY and is restricted overnight in certain locations as resident only. However, there is a pay lot on D Street (5 min. walk away) if y

name: 2BR/2BA w/ huge deck in city of Southie
summary: We welcome you to stay in our brand new home! Currently under construction, but will be available to guests starting in February. We are using the old photos, as the property is not complete. The new property will feature two bedrooms- one with a master en-suite bath, steam shower and double vanity. The second bedroom is kiddy-cornered to the second guest bathroom. Open kitchen living, with huge windows and French doors that exit onto a large deck.  True luxury in the heart of South Boston!
space: Our new home will feature recessed lighting and hardwood floors throughout. Custom cabinetry, chefs-grade kitchen with a beautiful marble waterfall island to anchor the space. The living room will have a gas fireplace, for guests to cuddle up near and relax. In the summers, guests can lounge around on the huge deck.  The bathrooms  are both beautifully tiled and designed with a classic New England aesthetic.
description: We welcome you to stay in our brand new home! Currently under construction, but will be available to guests starting in February. We are using the old photos, as the property is not complete. The new property will feature two bedrooms- one with a master en-suite bath, steam shower and double vanity. The second bedroom is kiddy-cornered to the second guest bathroom. Open kitchen living, with huge windows and French doors that exit onto a large deck.  True luxury in the heart of South Boston! Our new home will feature recessed lighting and hardwood floors throughout. Custom cabinetry, chefs-grade kitchen with a beautiful marble waterfall island to anchor the space. The living room will have a gas fireplace, for guests to cuddle up near and relax. In the summers, guests can lounge around on the huge deck.  The bathrooms  are both beautifully tiled and designed with a classic New England aesthetic. The washer/dryer is in the basement. There are stairs off the living room. You will share th
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is THE BEST. I'm a realtor in Boston, and hand's down, Southie is the best. Why? You have loads of bars and restaurants to choose from. Just minutes you are at the beach, which stretches over 3 miles to a historic Revolutionary War fort. Go rent kayaks, or paddle boards, or grab a lobster roll at Sully's. Seaport is just minutes and South End/Back Bay are just over the bridge. You can walk to the Downtown Waterfront, by walk through Seaport and over the bridge. You are literally in the center of EVERYTHING!
notes: I'm host in Central NY and have been hosting a home for a couple years now. I take hosting VERY seriously. You can always be assured that the house is professionally cleaned prior to any stays. All the linens, blankets, towels and bath mats are cleaned after every stay.  If you have any special needs, or requests, we always our best to accommodate. Our goal is expectional service, so please do not hesitate to reach out!
transit: Hubway - 3 blocks- These are bikes you can rent from the city. They are really convenient. We use them all the time.  The "T" - This is about 6 blocks away, if you want to hop to get to Cambridge/Somerville areas. If you are just getting to Downtown, it's honestly easier to walk or hubway.  Buses - 1/2 block - check local signs on destinations. They will take to the T, if you don't feel like walking the 6 blocks.  Uber/Lyft- cheap, easy and abundant! Taxis - haven't used in a while, but I'm sure they are still around ;)
access: The washer/dryer is in the basement. There are stairs off the living room. You will share this washer & dryer with the home directly below you.
interaction: I will be available to answer any questions you may have. Please always feel free to reach out!
house_rules: - We ask no loud music. Neighbors upstairs are very quiet people and want the place quiet at all times.  - Shoes should come off at the door. We have area rugs we'd like to keep nice. Please carry your shoes to the deck, if you want to put them on for the deck.
host_about:
Hi Everyone! I'm a real estate agent in Boston, originally from Clinton, NY. My family and I own a cute farm home in Deansboro,NY. We use the shop to build rustic furniture, so you'll see a lot of our furniture in the home. 

Because my family and I have had such and AMAZING experience with the renters on this site, I've decided to open up my two condo's in South Boston to the AirBnB community. We are just getting them up and running so we hope to provide the same excellent service as the Deansboro House. 

We look forward to meeting you!

name: Cozy 2BR in Heart of Southie
summary: Welcome to Southie! Our home is about 650SF 2-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment. So if you're thinking of hosting a dinner party, probably not the right place :) What we are great for is the location. We are 5 blocks from the beach, 1/2 block from Broadway (bars, restaurants, boutiques). We are a great way to see the city for much less than a hotel. Fully equipped kitchen if you did want to make a meal Charming fireplace, unique furniture, each room has central heat and AC! We'd love to have you!
space: The home is super cozy with a gas burning fireplace, personal touches and homemade furniture from our craft wood shop.
description: Welcome to Southie! Our home is about 650SF 2-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment. So if you're thinking of hosting a dinner party, probably not the right place :) What we are great for is the location. We are 5 blocks from the beach, 1/2 block from Broadway (bars, restaurants, boutiques). We are a great way to see the city for much less than a hotel. Fully equipped kitchen if you did want to make a meal Charming fireplace, unique furniture, each room has central heat and AC! We'd love to have you! The home is super cozy with a gas burning fireplace, personal touches and homemade furniture from our craft wood shop. Guests have access to the entire condo. There is also laundry on the same floor, shared with the condo above. I will socialize within the level you'd prefer.  Communication is key, so if you'd like us to meet you in person, we are happy to do this and give you tips. If you'd like your space and a keypad check in we can do this as well. Please just let us know what you'd prefer. The
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood has the beach, restaurants, bars, live music, a comedy club (in seaport, just 5 minutes Uber), boat cruises out of the seaport. Literally so much to see and do!
notes: This is our home and we take a lot of pride in our place. We hope you enjoy!
transit: There are Hubway bikes just down the street, if you feel like riding a bike. Uber, Lyft, city taxis are readily available. There is a bus stop to downtown just 50 yards from the house and a 15 minute walk to Broadway T station (red line).
access: Guests have access to the entire condo. There is also laundry on the same floor, shared with the condo above.
interaction: I will socialize within the level you'd prefer.  Communication is key, so if you'd like us to meet you in person, we are happy to do this and give you tips. If you'd like your space and a keypad check in we can do this as well. Please just let us know what you'd prefer.
house_rules: NA
host_about:
Hi Everyone! I'm a real estate agent in Boston, originally from Clinton, NY. My family and I own a cute farm home in Deansboro,NY. We use the shop to build rustic furniture, so you'll see a lot of our furniture in the home. 

Because my family and I have had such and AMAZING experience with the renters on this site, I've decided to open up my two condo's in South Boston to the AirBnB community. We are just getting them up and running so we hope to provide the same excellent service as the Deansboro House. 

We look forward to meeting you!

name: Minion 2? Downtown/Convention/Subway/Beach 130B
summary: An Entire 2 bedroom, 600sqft, apartment w/ 4 total beds (1 Queen, 2 Twin, 1 Sofa). Luxury beds/shower/sheets. 5 min drive to Downtown and Airport, 5 min walk to the Beach/Ocean, and 12 min walk to the Redline Subway station. In the South Boston neighborhood. The location is great because you've got the City, Nature, Beach, and Transportation. 2nd floor - no elevator. Approx $10 Uber ride to Boston Convention Center (BCEC). Great for a getaway too! No dedicated parking. Find our Minion friend?
space: ACTUAL GUEST REVIEW JULY 2018: “These guys are well prepared. Very smooth, access with codes, the place was impeccable, and the SHOWER head... OOOOOOHH that shower head... AWESOME! The smaller bedroom contains a bunk bed (Twin bed over a Twin bed) that can each hold an adult up to 250 pounds. Please note that there is no door on the 2nd bedroom - so it remains open to the living room. Beds: 1 queen bed in the bedroom, and 2 twin bunk beds, and the sofa turns into a full bed. neighborhood_overview: NEIGHBORHOOD: It's walking distance (10 mins) from 3 red-line subways (Andrews Square, Broadway, JFK) that will take you to downtown Boston and Cambridge, and you're also walking distance to Carson Beach (10 mins) where there is beach volleyball in the summer. There are a couple of great restaurants nearby, including one next door down the street from Telegraph Hill (called Telegraph Hill), and closer to the center of South Boston, there are a number of well regarded fine dining restaurants and bars – just 5-8 blocks away. Approx $10 Uber ride to the Boston Convention Center (BCEC), or approx 30 minute walk. DISTANCE TO POPULAR DESTINATIONS: 1. The Boston airport is 5.0 miles away and that's a 10 minute drive in normal traffic. You can also take the subway (blue or silver line, then to red line). 2. The BCEC (Boston Convention & Exhibition Center) is 1.4 miles away or a 32 minute walk or 5 minute drive.  3. The closest subway ("T") stop is at Andrew Square (red line) 0.3 miles away or
notes: TO HELP US ENSURE YOU HAVE A QUIET, PEACEFUL, AND ENJOYABLE TIME WHILE STAYING WITH US, WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO KNOW THE FOLLOWING APPLIES FOR ALL GUESTS WE HOST: 1. We ask you to remove your shoes while inside the units. Boston homes are full of charm, but are also some of the oldest in the country and thus the walls and floors are thin – and sound travels. Removing your shoes helps to both protect our floors, but also ensures the people below you also quietly enjoy their stay. 2. No loud noises before 9am and after 10pm. As noted above, sound travels. Our unit has a device by Netatmo, called the Home Health Coach, and it measures air quality/pollution, humidity, temperature, and noise levels – and amongst other things, alerts us when noise levels get too high. Sounds are NOT recorded though. 3. For your safety, we also have a Leeo which monitors for the smoke alarm and carbon monoxide alarms and notifies us if they sound off, so as to keep you safe. We get notified if an alarm goes off
transit: It's walking distance (10 mins) from 2 red-line subways that will take you to downtown Boston and Cambridge. There is also a bus stop right out front. See the HOUSE MANUAL for parking tips. There is also Uber that can pickup/dropoff for inexpensive to downtown Boston. Approx $10 Uber ride to the Boston Convention Center (BCEC), or approx 30 minute walk.
access: The entire unit (kitchen, bathroom, living room, bedrooms), and common laundry. Parking is often available on the street during the daytime and weekends, but much more difficult at night and during snow emergencies. Keyless entry system. As your arrival date nears, 1 day prior, you will be sent a message with instructions for electronic keycode access. Check in time is 3pm, and check out time is 11am - that gives us a 4 hour window to have my cleaning crew fully clean, disinfect, change sheets, for your arrival and the guest coming in after you. You can check in anytime thereafter. Please note that this also means that the 11am check out must be strictly adhered to on your last day, as we may have another guest checking in that afternoon, and need time for my cleaning people to do the same. Unlike a hotel that has multiple rooms to shuffle around, that is not the case here.
interaction: This is a fully contained private apartment so there is no need for direct interaction with guests, though we do like to meet you and you will see us around the building doing maintenance, etc.. You may call/text/email through here anytime as well. Before you arrive and after you leave, my cleaning crew will come in to clean and disinfect everything, replace all the sheets with newly clean ones. Please remember that check in time is 3pm and check out is 11am - this is important because I often have guests check in/out on the same days, back-to-back.
house_rules: - Quiet hours before 9AM and after 10PM - Please remove shoes while inside the apartment - Please be considerate of our neighbors
host_about: I grew up in Colorado, moved to Cambridge to attend MIT, moved away to London and various places, now back in Boston for the past 20 years. My husband, Sean is a retired US Army veteran and graduate of the US Military Academy (West Point) - and we love to host. We also like to travel and we host as we would want to be hosted when we travel - we like comfort and convenience. Come visit, play some volleyball at the nearby beach - or just head downtown - we can walk there too!

neighborhood_overview: South Boston is a seaside Boston neighborhood with a rich cultural history. Within walking distance are several beautiful beaches, historic Castle Island, and many local restaurants and shops on Broadway.
notes: Parking in Boston, like other major cities is a challenge. Street parking, if available, can be found a few blocks away. Please check with us to help answer any questions regarding where to park.  Street parking is usually available before 4. We can help with early check in or luggage drop off to help with parking.  Paid parking across from our house may be available.
transit: Ideally located for exploring Boston. Two blocks from bus routes (5, 7, 9, 10, 11) that provide easy access to the Red, Orange, Green, and Silver subway lines, as well quick transit as to South Station (10 minutes via car and public transit), the Convention Center (7 minutes via car; 15 minutes public transit), and to Logan Airport (12 minutes via car; 30 minutes via public transit). Convenient location for ridesharing drop off/pick up, with most spots in the Seaport and Downtown about a 6 to 10 minute ride away.
access: We want you to feel welcome. In our Boston Tea Party Room Room, we have complimentary coffee, tea, and light refreshments for you to enjoy.
interaction: We live in a private apartment (with separate entrance) on the first floor, and our three guest suites are on the second floor. We are happy to be a resource to guests and to answer questions you may have during your stay.
house_rules: Maximum of 2 Guests per room. Must include names of all guests! Please respect our house and our other guests and keep noise to a minimum.
host_about: Third generation South Bostonian. History buff and Irish music devotee. Experienced business and leisure travelers.  Past owners of a travel agency, and c level business exec.  We bring our experience and expectations of a welcoming accommodation to our two suites for you to enjoy.

South Boston is buzzing with activity with tons of hip bars and restaurants within walking distance. 7 mins to Logan airport, 11 to downtown Boston, 4 mins to BCEC/seaport district. space: Everything is sparkling in this fully renovated bi-level apartment. Open floor plan, fabulous kitchen and fireplace in living room.  Large deck and parking for one car. Bedrooms are well appointed with lots of closet space and numerous bathrooms. Laundry room is on second floor, off main bathroom. This is a second floor,bi-level apartment so you have to climb a flight of stairs to access. Parking details are extremely important. We take no responsibility for cars parked in incorrect spots or resulting towing charges. We are registered with the City of Boston as a Short Term Rental. Registration number: STR383144

neighborhood_overview: South Boston is a lively and vibrant neighborhood with plenty of great restaurants and bars nearby. It's location makes it a popular place to live or visit with its easy commute to downtown Boston, Logan airport, TD Garden and the Convention Center.   South Boston also boasts a wonderful waterfront with numerous beaches, parks and the historic Castle Island at its tip. Take a stroll to "The Lawn on D" for fun activities and music or visit the L Street Tavern, home to the movie, Good Will Hunting. Rent a bike from in  front of the library on East Broadway or the Bank of America building on West Broadway.
notes: Short term registration number: STR383144
transit: We have parking for one car so parking won't be an issue should you choose to bring a vehicle. Depending on the weather, you can certainly walk to restaurants, bars, coffee shops or convenience stores. Ubering is a great way to get around and the preferred method of transport, especially if you are unfamiliar with the area!
access: Guests have full access to apartment including large deck off kitchen and private patio off master suite. Guests will have access to one parking spot. Details will be sent with check-in instructions.  Guests who do not pay attention to very clear parking instructions and use incorrect spot, will have car towed.
interaction: We are always available by text or phone call to answer any questions or address any issues our guests may have.
house_rules: Absolutely no parties or events of any kind are allowed in our home. Zero tolerance policy. Please remove shoes before entering apartment.   We do provide slippers for your comfort and especially appreciate this in winter season when ice melt and sand can damage floors.  Quiet hours 11pm-7am.  This is city living and we have wonderful neighbors and also tenants on first floor. It's important to be respectful of noise levels.  Off street parking for one car only. Please let us know if you will have a car so we can instruct you accordingly. No food in bedrooms. Please use kitchen and dining area to eat. Please do not leave wet towels on hardwood floors. All used towels should be put in bath tub before departure. We do supply black face cloths to remove makeup or tan. Please do not use white towels to remove make up, tan or hair dye.  Please do not move the furniture around. It scratches up the floors.  Absolutely no smoking of any kind inside home. Please use back deck if you do smoke an
host_about:
We love to travel, spend time with family and find great restaurants. Valerie is from Ireland and Michael is Boston born and raised. We have four beautiful boys. 
As an airbnb guest, very clean and comfortable is the hope. I don't need anything super fancy, just a good overall experience, a few restaurant recommendations and a responsive host. As a host, I would strive to provide the same, if not more, and make it so that you couldn't wait to return! :)

name: Penthouse 1BR in Seaport by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic, open-concept living area with incredible floor-to-ceiling windows, spacious bedroom with a comfortable King-size bed, and modern fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in Seaport, you're at the center of one of Boston's best design and culture scenes, and close to an assortment of wonderful museums, diverse restaurants, and lively entertainment.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic, open-concept living area with incredible floor-to-ceiling windows, spacious bedroom with a comfortable King-size bed, and modern fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in Seaport, you're at the center of one of Boston's best design and culture scenes, and close to an assortment of wonderful museums, diverse restaurants, and lively entertainment. Bordering downtown Boston, the Seaport District is a beautiful and convenient area for all travelers in the Boston area. During the summer, Blue Hills Bank Pavilion, Boston Harborwalk, and nearby beaches attract tourists looking to soak up some New England sun. If you're here for work, the nearby Seaport World Trade Center and Boston Convention and Exhibition Center are huge hubs for business travelers because of the neighborhood's proximity to Logan International Airport. However, you may want to bring along the family to explore the nearby Boston Children's Mus
neighborhood_overview: Bordering downtown Boston, the Seaport District is a beautiful and convenient area for all travelers in the Boston area. During the summer, Blue Hills Bank Pavilion, Boston Harborwalk, and nearby beaches attract tourists looking to soak up some New England sun. If you're here for work, the nearby Seaport World Trade Center and Boston Convention and Exhibition Center are huge hubs for business travelers because of the neighborhood's proximity to Logan International Airport. However, you may want to bring along the family to explore the nearby Boston Children's Museum, Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum, and the Institute of Contemporary Art.
notes: Due to new development, you may encounter some construction that may be audible from your Sonder. Construction is during normal business hours Monday - Friday. Noise machines and ear plugs are available upon request.
transit: NA
interaction: NA
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

space: The unit gets great light and overlooks East Broadway Street. Most of our units are designed to be interchangeable and each unit has at least one "like-kind" unit within the same building that is similar in size and identical in amenities as well as sleeping capacity. In most cases the unit you have reserved is the unit you will be staying in, however, we reserve the right to put you in a like-kind unit for the term of your rental. If you are given a like-kind unit it is guaranteed to be in the same building and no more than one floor above the unit you have reserved (this only applies to buildings without elevators). If your unit is going to be changed to a like-kind unit you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance.

name: Open-Concept 2BR in Seaport by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy living area with sleek wooden floors, beautiful private patio with a cozy sitting area, and incredible fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in Seaport, you're at the center of one of Boston's best design and culture scenes, and close to an assortment of wonderful museums, diverse restaurants, and lively entertainment.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and airy living area with sleek wooden floors, beautiful private patio with a cozy sitting area, and incredible fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances and ensuite laundry. Located in Seaport, you're at the center of one of Boston's best design and culture scenes, and close to an assortment of wonderful museums, diverse restaurants, and lively entertainment. Bordering downtown Boston, the Seaport District is a beautiful and convenient area for all travelers in the Boston area. During the summer, Blue Hills Bank Pavilion, Boston Harborwalk, and nearby beaches attract tourists looking to soak up some New England sun. If you're here for work, the nearby Seaport World Trade Center and Boston Convention and Exhibition Center are huge hubs for business travelers because of the neighborhood's proximity to Logan International Airport. However, you may want to bring along the family to explore the nearby Boston Children's Museum, Boston Tea Party Shi
neighborhood_overview: Bordering downtown Boston, the Seaport District is a beautiful and convenient area for all travelers in the Boston area. During the summer, Blue Hills Bank Pavilion, Boston Harborwalk, and nearby beaches attract tourists looking to soak up some New England sun. If you're here for work, the nearby Seaport World Trade Center and Boston Convention and Exhibition Center are huge hubs for business travelers because of the neighborhood's proximity to Logan International Airport. However, you may want to bring along the family to explore the nearby Boston Children's Museum, Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum, and the Institute of Contemporary Art.
notes: Due to new development, you may encounter some construction that may be audible from your Sonder. Construction is during normal business hours Monday - Friday. Noise machines and ear plugs are available upon request.
transit: NA
interaction: NA
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: Modern/Entire apt/1bdrm/Tstop/Ideal location
summary: First time listing! Spacious 1 bedroom with 950 sqft of living space. Open concept modern design. Queen bed in bedroom, and a blowup mattress available to accommodate additional guests.  A must for those who want to tour the city then come home to a quiet South Boston apartment. Steps to the Broadway T stop (1 stop to South Station), steps to multiple restaurants & bars in South Boston, quick walk to South End (3mins), China Town (10 mins), & Downtown (15 mins). ~10 mins drive to the airport.
space: High ceilings and very spacious interior. Wonderful outdoor space with private garden and private access from the street.

I’m excited about getting started and happy to host my first few guests! 

I hope you get to experience and fall in love with Boston, just as I have.

name: Separate EnSuite Pvt Entry+Pvt Bath+Keyless Luxury
summary: Open the door to your private Suite with private bath.  No apartment to share, no walking through shared rooms. Drop your bags, grab a cup of tea or coffee and relax before heading off to work or play. A queen size pillow top bed with luxury linen awaits.  Wake up and enjoy a complimentary light continental breakfast.  A good size walk in shower and nice heavy towels to finish things off.  Welcome to The Boston Bailey B&B!  The next level in B&B’s.
space: The Boston Bailey B&B offers three Luxury Suites. Our "One if by Land" second-floor suite features a new queen bed, new private bath with shower, and a sitting area with couch, table and chairs. We have a streamlined check-in process with RemoteLock technology, which makes it easy to access your space via coded (keyless) entry. Please keep in mind that our three private suites; "One if by Land", "Two if by Sea" and The "Paul Revere" Suites are located on the second floor.  There are 18 stairs to begin enjoying your stay. We provide complimentary coffee, tea, bottled water and continental breakfast.  We also equipped our suites with Roku Smart TVs to enjoy free Netflix access. Bring your walking and running shoes. You must take the 1 3/4 mile walk/run around Castle Island.  A walk/run that includes a Historic Fort independence, Perfect viewing for plane watching of Logan Airport, Sully's Hot Dogs and a path into Boston Harbor. Need more space?  Book all three of our suites  https://www.

neighborhood_overview: South Boston is a seaside Boston neighborhood with a rich cultural history. Within walking distance are several beautiful beaches, historic Castle Island, and many local restaurants and shops on Broadway.  We are close to everything Boston, whether by foot, bus or rideshare.
notes: Parking in Boston, like other major cities is a challenge. Street parking, if available, can be found a few blocks away. Please check with us to help answer any questions regarding where to park.   We do not have on site parking.   Street parking, in very limited areas, is usually available before 4. We can help with early check in or luggage drop off to help with parking.
transit: Ideally located for exploring Boston. One block from bus routes (5, 7, 9, 10, 11) that provide easy access to the Red, Orange, Green, and Silver subway lines, as well quick transit as to South Station, Boston Convention Center, Financial District, Colleges and to Logan Airport (12 minutes via car; 30 minutes via public transit). Convenient location for ridesharing drop off/pick up, with most spots in the Seaport and Downtown about a 6 to 10 minute ride away.
access: We want you to feel welcome. In our Welcome Room, we call it The Boston Tea Party Room, we have complimentary coffee, tea, water, and a light continental breakfast. Need more space?  Book both our suites!
interaction: We live in a private apartment (with separate entrance) on the first floor, and our two guest suites are on the second floor. We are happy to be a resource to guests and to answer questions you may have during your stay.
house_rules: Guests must be at least 21 years of age to book our suites.  Must include names of all guests! Please keep in mind there are 18 steps to our two suites. Please respect our house and our other guests and keep noise to a minimum.
host_about: Third generation South Bostonian. History buff and Irish music devotee. Experienced business and leisure travelers.  Past owners of a travel agency, and c level business exec.  We bring our experience and expectations of a welcoming accommodation to our two suites for you to enjoy.

name: NEW 3 BR Luxury Private Home, Boston/Seaport/BCEC
summary: A beautiful, newly constructed home all to yourself with a private entrance in bustling South Boston! Equipped with several private bedrooms as well as two full bathrooms and outdoor deck space, this home features luxurious amenities in an unbeatable location with access to a plethora of shops and restaurants. One mile exactly to the Convention Center. This is the perfect place for large groups and companies who seek a first class Boston experience.
space: An entire 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home of your very own that can accommodate up to 8 guests. Our top-of-the-line keyless digital entry system allows guests to conveniently and securely access the private home throughout their stay.  The home contains an open concept living room, dining, and kitchen as well as two outdoors decks! The living room contains a couch that pulls out into a Queen size bed that can be made up in advance to create a sleeping arrangement that best suits your group’s needs. Extra blankets, linens, and towels are also available, should you need them at any point during your stay. All bedrooms contain a Queen-sized bed.  There is a FULL kitchen stocked with all cooking utensils including pots, pans, dishes, glasses, silverware, cutting boards, knives, etc. Microwave, Stove/Oven, Refrigerator, Dishwasher (and soap), Coffee Maker, and even some basic snacks that you are welcome to utilize for free. Extra blankets, linens, and towels are also ava
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Boston’s beloved “Southie” neighborhood, guests can enjoy close proximity to downtown and convenient access to public transportation. Whether you are in town for business, or you are looking for some time to unwind, our home’s central location is sure to suit your needs. Guests joining us for business travel can enjoy recharging from a busy day at work in a tranquil setting with convenient access to the BCEC (ONLY ONE MILE!), Seaport district, downtown, and financial district. There are also many fantastic bars and restaurants to grab a bite or delicious cocktail. Or if you are craving a night in, everything you would want or need to create a delicious home-cooked meal is located within a mile of the home, including small boutique shops and larger supermarkets. South Boston also boasts a wonderful waterfront with numerous beaches, parks, and the historic Castle Island. Take a stroll to "The Lawn on D" for fun activities and music or visit the L Street Tavern, ho
notes: Our home is set in a quiet, family-centric neighborhood; out of respect for our neighbors, we ask that tenants keep noise to a minimum after 10:00pm. Please do not use the outdoor spaces after 11:00pm. Check in is any time between 3pm-2am though host will not respond after 10pm and check out is by 11am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance.  For those considering bringing a private vehicle, there is ONE parking space. There is also ample street parking available in the area, but can be tricky to navigate as there are certain "resident-only" hours, particularly during the weekdays. From Monday to Friday, the vast majority of side streets only allow vehicles with a resident permit to park overnight. We would recommend that guests with more than one private vehicle download and use the app “Spot,” a reliable and budget-friendly option that allows you to rent parking from local parking spot owne
transit: We are ~3-5 min walk to the nearest bus stop and 1 mile from the nearest T stop. We are also located 1 mile from the convention center.
interaction: You will have complete privacy here. That said, we are available should you have any questions or needs during your stay and can be contacted via phone or email.
house_rules: -No smoking anywhere in the house or on the deck: If it's reported that you smoked inside or outside the apartment or the apartment smells like smoke (that includes tobacco/weed and otherwise) there is a $350 fine with no exceptions. 	 -Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises.   - Check in is any time between 3pm-2am  -Check out by 11am. If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm that was not discussed with the host. Any guest who is still in the home after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. Again, this does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance. - No loud music especially after 10pm.	 - N
host_about: I live in Boston though am originally from upstate NY. I love traveling and am a huge gastronome so very much enjoy exploring a city’s food and cocktail scene. To help bring balance,  I find enjoyment in movement so I make time to Crossfit , run , spin - you name it -to stay active wherever I go.

neighborhood_overview: East Broadway Street offers affordable monthly rentals (month to month, or 30 days or longer) conveniently located near the Red Line subway for commuters and the wildly popular Seaport District, known for its restaurants and night life. This building offers 3 furnished studio apartments and 5 furnished one bedroom apartment rentals, all of which are available for stays of 30 days or longer. The apartments and common areas of the building were renovated in Spring of 2013. There is a common laundry room and all apartments are accessed by stairs. neighborhood_overview: About Seaport:   Boston's Seaport neighborhood has always been a scenic enclave near downtown; now it's rapidly becoming the place to live, shop, dine out, and entertain. A stunning renewal is nearing completion that will transform this harbor-side district into one of the prime destinations for the region. Shopping for days. Dining that will leave you savoring even that final morsel. Entertainment to satisfy the vibrant, diverse community that is becoming the new Seaport. Super close to ICA (Institute of Contemporary Arts), Convention Center, Lawn on D, Moakley Courthouse and Boston Childrens Museum
notes: Parking Garage available at additional fee and is based on availability. I have other apartments available in and around the area so feel free to shoot me a message with your dates and I can check other options for you!
transit: 10 minute walk to Downtown. Close to Fanuel Hall and Aquarium as well. The train is very accessible and uber is also another option for a cheap ride to Back Bay or North End NEARBY TRANSPORTATION Subway Silver Line – Courthouse Station Red Line – South Station Commuter Rail – South Station Buses 4 – Courthouse Station  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) – World Trade Centre Station  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) – South Station Ferries F1 – Rowes Wharf Ferry Terminal F4, F2H – Long Wharf Ferry Terminal
access: 24-hour fitness center 2 Conference Rooms Business center Electric car charging stations On-site retail Rooftop Pool (seasonal) Sun deck 24-hour package pickup Bike storage Cyber lounge Parking garage Smoke-free community Yoga and Spin studio
interaction: I am available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: House Rules 1. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout and I can confirm in 24 hours. 2. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 3. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. It may be possible to obtain permission to host a party; contact me to learn more. 4. If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $50 for every extra hour of cleaning required. 5. Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events. 6. If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in ful
host_about: Im a Boston native and happy to help you see the great parts of Boston that arent in the Guidebooks. I look forward to connecting with people traveling to Boston and aim to make each guest experience this beautiful place like a local. Thanks for checking out my place and I hope to talk to you soon!

name: The WOW 2 BDR apartment! Downtown Boston area
summary: Seven30 East Broadway offers beautiful new condos in South Boston. What seems like a typical residential building with simple windows, takes luxury up a notch. Inside this nondescript building, you may just find the apartment of your dreams.
space: 2 BED 2 BATH SLEEPS 5 Very Spacious floor plans, Fully-equipped kitchens, Living Room, Bedroom, Bathroom, in-unit Laundry Facilities, and Substantial Closet Space, all elaborately and intricately designed. This unique South Boston location will place you very conveniently next to seaport. Only 1 mile to the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center located right across the Reserve Channel, all within walking distance along a beautiful scenic route. With Stop & Shop directly across the street, Rite Aid in the back, and, encircled in many Dining, Shopping, and Entertainment options, everything is just a bit simpler. Not to worry, traveling is almost as easy. Just a few steps away from the L St. & E. Broadway intersection, makes transportation all the more convenient.

name: Cozy 3BR! Seconds to Subway, Minutes to Downtown!
summary: Knock on Boston door without the high prices. Easy commute to downtown Boston or Convention Center. Walk within seconds to Andrew Square stop off the Red Line.  Great for sight-seeing in Boston or attending conventions! The space is designed for both play and work, and comes with three Bedrooms, living area, and a large eating in kitchen.  Each bedroom comes equipped with queen size bed.  High-speed wifi and Netflix subscription are also included for your entertainment.
space: Your home for the week comes with three queen size beds, oversized eat in kitchen with large dining table, bonus enclosed porch to enjoy city breezes and washer/dryer in unit. Working from home? One of the lovely features in this apartment is available desk space in all of the three bedrooms.  Full kitchen stuffed with all the plates, glasses, pots and pans to make a home cooked meal. Too busy seeing Boston to cook? There are plenty of good eating opportunities available nearby!  The living room has a large couch that folds flat to sleep an extra guest. Although we do not have cable, we have a TV with streaming opportunities including a Netflix subscription for your watching pleasure.  There is a bonus enclosed sunroof in the back of the house with couches and coffee table for easy entertaining with the feeling of being outdoors without the elements!   You are 1 minute walk to Andrew Square T stop off the red line. This makes it incredible easy commuting to all of Boston popular sites
description: Knock on Boston door without the high prices. Easy commute to downtown Boston or Convention Center. Walk within seconds to Andrew Square stop off the Red Line.  Great for sight-seeing in Boston or attending conventions! The space is designed for both play and work, and comes with three Bedrooms, living area, and a large eating in kitchen.  Each bedroom comes equipped with queen size bed.  High-speed wifi and Netflix subscription are also included for your entertainment. Your home for the week comes with three queen size beds, oversized eat in kitchen with large dining table, bonus enclosed porch to enjoy city breezes and washer/dryer in unit. Working from home? One of the lovely features in this apartment is available desk space in all of the three bedrooms.  Full kitchen stuffed with all the plates, glasses, pots and pans to make a home cooked meal. Too busy seeing Boston to cook? There are plenty of good eating opportunities available nearby!  The living room has a large couch that f
neighborhood_overview: Tradititionally called the Polish Triangle or Andrew Square, we highly recommend checking out Café Polonia and Baltic Deli & Café.  Both are within walking distance of your unit. You are also just seconds away from Andrew Square T stop off the red line. This makes it incredible easy commuting to all of Boston popular sites.  Please see the Getting Around section for more details! Additionally, near the house is a shopping center called South Bay Center.  There is a newly built movie theatre there as well. It is a 17 minute walk or a 6 minute door to door via the bus from Andrew station.
notes: Before booking, we ask that you have finished the Airbnb verification process by verifying one social media account and scanning your offline ID. Go to www.airbnb.com/verify for more info. The unit is close to the subway station, so there might be a little bit of noise coming from the subway line during the operation time for one of the bedroom facing the street.  Earplugs and eye masks are provided for your stay. Also, please tell us about yourself and what brings you to Boston.
transit: The Subway:  You are just seconds from Andrew Station on the redline.  Most of the sight-seeing goodness of Boston are just minutes away.  After you enter the station, take the train that goes towards 'Alewife' direction, and here are some our favorite highlights by each stops: - South Station (2 stops away): This is a major train station in Boston.  You are only a stone throw away from awesome neighborhoods like the Seaport area (just walk across the bridge), Chinatown, and Financial District. 		 - Downtown Crossing (3 stops away): This is the heart of Boston Downtown.  On Washington street you can find shopping, restaurants, and coffee shops.  This is the stop where you can also transfer to Orange line subway that will take you to Haymarket station (North End/Little Italy) and North Station (TD Garden). - Park Street (4 stops away): Upon exiting the station, you will find the oldest city park in the US (dated from 1634), Boston Common, as well as the start of the Freedom Trail.  Hist
access: You will have access to the whole apartment. Fully furnished with linens, towels, soap, shampoo, iron/ironing board, and hair dryer. Fully appliance kitchen with enough pots and pans to cook a 5 star meal.
interaction: Either myself or our co-host will always be available via the Airbnb app during the day and by phone for emergencies.
house_rules: -We kindly ask you to please remove your shoes when you are in the unit. -Quiet time starts at 10 pm. -No partying
host_about: My husband and I originally came from Taipei Taiwan, now we have settled into Boston for quite a few years and made it our home!  My husband and I travel frequently for work, and we also rent our spaces in Taiwan and Boston to travelers.

name: Urban Treehouse King
summary: Sunny top floor bedroom on Thomas Park in the heart of historic Southie. Private, lockable bathroom across top floor landing. (Landing has an adjacent unit with en suite bath, inquire to book both.) Hosts don't share guest space. Frequent happy hours with all guests on a lower level balcony - its fun to meet your neighbors! Restaurants, bus, beach a few minutes walk. City center, Seaport 30 min walk. King bed, Therapedic mattress. Ensuite Nespresso & fridge. Fee for bike rental, airport service.
space: Charming & Historic South Boston, built (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Search "Dorchester Heights" for historical significance! * Private guest entrance (shared with other guest, but not hosts). 2nd floor guest living room with fireplace - hosts may leave treats there from time to time. Also piano room with baby-grand. You are welcome to play! Guest hallway & staircase leads up to the bedroom level, where there are 2 side-by-side (lockable) units. (To book both simultaneously, please inquire.) * (Hidden by Airbnb) Home in every room for your music & convenience. * Frequent happy hour out on the back balcony to meet your hosts and the guests in your neighboring room. Has an outdoor fireplace and overlooks the courtyard.
description: Sunny top floor bedroom on Thomas Park in the heart of historic Southie. Private, lockable bathroom across top floor landing. (Landing has an adjacent unit with en suite bath, inquire to book both.) Hosts don't share guest space. Frequent happy hours with all guests on a lower level balcony - its fun to meet your neighbors! Restaurants, bus, beach a few minutes walk. City center, Seaport 30 min walk. King bed, Therapedic mattress. Ensuite Nespresso & fridge. Fee for bike rental, airport service. Charming & Historic South Boston, built (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Search "Dorchester Heights" for historical significance! * Private guest entrance (shared with other guest, but not hosts). 2nd floor guest living room with fireplace - hosts may leave treats there from time to time. Also piano room with baby-grand. You are welcome to play! Guest hallway & staircase leads up to the bedroom level, where there are 2 side-by-side (lockable) units. (To book both simultaneously, please inquire.)
neighborhood_overview: * Quiet side street just one block away from the hubub. Lots of restaurants, nightlife, sportsbars, grocery & pharmacy within short walking distance. * Hottest sushi place in the city a one-minute walk * 3 blocks from beautiful beach * 3 minute walk to local 9, 10 & 11 bus to Back Bay * 20 minute walk to Broadway subway station (the 9 bus passes Broadway stop if you don't want to walk.)
notes: This house has lots of stairs! It also has 3 little dogs who aren't allowed in the bedrooms during your stay, but are frequently allowed in the library and piano room. So allergy sufferers be aware.
transit: When you book, we will send you the Urban Treehouse website for more info, but the basics: * 2 rental bikes, locks & helmets with safety deposit. $25 per bike per day. Cycle around town or the 5 miles of ocean-front boardwalk. * 3 minute walk to local 9, 10 & 11 bus to Back Bay * 20 minute walk to Broadway subway station (the 9 bus passes Broadway stop if you don't want to walk.)
access: Door keypad for self-check-in if needed. Top 2 floors of house are for guests, back deck is shared. (No kitchen access, but if you need something let us know!)
interaction: Normally we will be available, and will let you know in advance if for some reason we have an engagement that takes us offline completely - it would be rare. We are more than delighted to meet & chat with our guests! But to give you your privacy we'll let you make the first move. :-)
house_rules: Quiet hours on the patio after 11
host_about: Later

description: One bedroom condo in Boston! 5 minutes from the Broadway red line subway stop and a block from Broadway street, where many buses run. 1-2 miles from downtown and the Boston Common, the North End, Back Bay, and the Seaport convention center. My condo occupies one full floor of a three floor house, so you have the whole level to yourself. Full access to my condo (one bedroom). I will be away! All yours! Southie is a hip neighborhood in Boston convenient to everything. No parking available, but very close to the red line subway (3 blocks away) and buses (on Broadway street). I ask for a meaningful security deposit to make sure nothing goes wrong! This is my home, and so I'd ask you to be as careful with it as you would be in your own home.  Airbnb is controversial in Boston. While here, I'd appreciate it if you limited interaction with the neighbors (who I never see - so that shouldn't be hard!).

neighborhood_overview: This former industrial district along Fort Point Channel is filled with historic lofts, many housing art studios and galleries. The Boston Children’s Museum on the Harborwalk path, marked by a giant Hood Milk Bottle in front, draws families to its interactive exhibits. Nearby, the floating Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum commemorates the 1773 protest. Upscale restaurants, trendy bars and cafes line Congress Street.
notes: We don't have a TV set up yet but there is wifi and there is a TV in the lounge right next door.
transit: 315 on A Apartments are a five minute ride from Boston South Station and the Seaport. Uber is always available.

description: Private room with ensuite in luxury 2 bed condo. Sonos speakers, air conditioning, high-speed wifi, roofdeck, designer kitchen. As with most suburbs in the city of Boston after 6 PM street parking is for residents only. So it is important for our guests to factor that into their plans. There is a garage about a 5-10 minute drive from our house which is fairly inexpensive - booking through the Spothero app is best for this.  The easiest way to get around is by walking, bus, or Uber. We have a gorgeous golden retriever puppy @aluckygolden (Instagram) who will be in the house. He will sleep in our room when we have guests. However, this listing is better suited for dog enthusiasts.

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

house_rules: NA
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Lux 2BR Apt in Boston Seaport w/WiFi
summary: This building offers beautiful new condos in South Boston. What seems like a typical residential building with simple windows, takes luxury up a notch. Inside this nondescript building, you may just find the apartment of your dreams. Very Spacious floor plans, Fully-equipped kitchens, Living Room, Bedroom, Bathroom, in-unit Laundry Facilities, and Substantial Closet Space, all elaborately and intricately designed.
space: This building takes luxury up a notch!  Inside, you'll find the apartment of your dreams located next to seaport and just 1 mile from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center and surrounded by many dining, shopping and entertainments options.   Property amenities include: • Wifi • Meeting room • Private outdoor space • Individual washer/dryer in the apartment  The private bedroom features a deluxe queen size bed with our indulgent custom linens, fluffy duvet, and plush pillows, two night tables with lamps, clock radio, dresser and a large closet.  The second bedroom has a Queen bed and a spacious closet.  A second bathroom is available. The Living Room includes a sofa with pullout bed, club chair, an entertainment center with a flat panel LCD TV, DVD/VCR player, CD stereo system, a dining area with seating for four and a work desk with lamp and your choice of wired or wireless Internet access.  The gourmet kitchen features granite counter-tops and full size stainless steel appliance

name: Luxury City View Apartment with Great Amenities
summary: Located in Boston's hottest neighborhood!- Just steps to some of the top restaurants & lounges in the city, The ICA, Boston's World Trade Center, The Blue Hills Bank Pavilion & Boston's Convention & Exhibition Centers. Accessible via public transport-Less than 10min walk from MBTAs South Station, NE Aquarium and minutes drive to historic Fenway Park. Tastefully decorated. Queen bed and two full beds. Immaculate features and city views. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers!
space: The apartment features: 2 Bedrooms (Queen Size Bed in master bedroom, two full beds in the second bedroom) European-style cabinetry Granite countertops Stainless steel appliances Premium Bathroom Finishes Central heat and air conditioning Washer and dryer full-size Wood-style flooring
